Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (43.94%) toThionin-like peptide 1GRAVY: -0.39; mol Wt: 3285.725; mol formula: C144H220N34O46S3; mol ex coeff: 1677.5.Activity: treated at 200 ug/ml (60.8 uM), changed viability C. albicans, C. buinensi, and C. parapsilosis by ~37%.MOA:fungi: induced membrane permeabilization.Toxicity: not hemo.lytic at 400 ug/ml (121.6 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Cherene MB, Taveira GB, Almeida-Silva F, da Silva MS, Cavaco MC, da Silva-Ferreira AT, Perales JEA, de Oliveira Carvalho A, Ven√¢ncio TM, da Motta OV, Rodrigues R, Castanho MARB, Gomes VM. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Structural and Biochemical Characterization of Three Antimicrobial Peptides from Capsicum annuum L. var. annuum Leaves for Anti-Candida Use.
